6.4.22  3:02 pm   I've been trying to get to know music better through actual songs like you advise, but I've been having trouble. I can hear the main melody and what the bass is playing, and by being able to hear the tonic/key it's in, I can play the melody and bassline quite easily on the piano after and transpose to any other key, but I don't know how to hear all the notes that the guitar and piano/keyboard are playing. Most of the time, I can barely even hear them over the drums/percussion. Even in solo piano/guitar arrangements though, it's very difficult to hear the notes other than the melody and bass. Should I be trying to hear each individual note and then put it together one by one to make find out the chord, hear the chord all at once, or something else entirely?
